11.title: Male

111.content: Which Universes Best Boy will be Lucky?
111.title: Male

1111.content:
You have selected Alvin And The Chipmunks.

Which Chipmunk will be rubbing the Artifact?
1111.title: Alvin and The Chipmunks

1112.content:
You have Selected Danny Phantom.

Which boy will be chosen?
1112.title: Danny Phantom

112.content:
You had just broken up with your girlfriend and were in a pretty foul mood. After all, you had been a faithful and caring boyfriend; why should she suddenly say that it's "over" between the two of you? You'd show her! You would fine someone better for you--and while she was growing old and alone, you'd be living it up with your new girlfriend!

As you were ranting to yourself, however, you noticed something; you had a feeling that something was calling out to you, but you don't know from where. Looking around, you saw it: a small, golden oil lamp, one that looked like genies would be in it.

Scoffing, you picked it up. Thinking it could be worth a couple of bucks, you start to rub it: as you do, the lamp glows and knowledge flows into your head. You learn the lamp actually is a genie lamp, but it has lost it's last master and his various genies--or "djinn"--for unexplained reasons. As the new founder, you are now its new master and you can begin gaining new genies.

Holding the lamp away, you laugh a bit, amazed to have such a powerful tool in your hand. As you think, you decide the best course of action is to look for a djinn who wouldn't be all that missed--like maybe one of your waifus from a show or video game. Then again, you could also get back on your ex-girlfriend, teach her a lesson in breaking up with you, but maybe it would be better to just forgive and forget...

What do you choose?
112.title: The Lamp

1122.content:
You decide to go for a fictional woman. It would be easier, and maybe you could decide about what to do with your ex later.

But still, there were so many options! Deciding that maybe it would be interesting to get a woman from an animated series first, or something like that, you think what would be the best medium.

There were cartoons, of course. But there were also comics, anime and manga, videogames, web animation (and comics), animated films--and many more!

So, what do you choose?
1122.title: A New Jessica Rabbit

11221.content:
An anime would be a good start; after all, there were plenty of gorgeous girls there. But which one?

You think maybe one of the big ones, like Pokémon or Yu-Gi-Oh would be good starting places, but maybe you'd prefer a lesser known work...
11221.title: Anime

112211.content:
Deciding Pokémon is the best bet, you look to the lamp and say, "I wish we were in the world of Pokémon!" In a bright flash, you are in a new area--what appears to be Pallet Town. Excited, you begin to head off, before stopping for a second.

You think about your choices here: there are indeed a lot of different female characters, both main and minor. So, why not just wait around and see who would be good here. You even remember Ash's mom, Delia, being quite the looker. But then again, there are a great deal of other girls...
112211.title: Gotta Catch 'em All

1122111.content:
You decide that staying in Pallet Town for the time being won't be too bad. As you are walking around, seeing the sights and taking in the fact that you are in the Pokémon world, you spot her: Delia Ketchum, Ash's gorgeous mother. As you watch her picking up groceries, you remember your youth; as a kid, you started to have a crush on the gorgeous woman, loving how sweet and innocent--as well as slightly clueless--she was and how she never seemed to get upset over anything. She always had this air of calm about her that indicated nothing could go wrong.

A part of you wants to go after her so bad, to make her yours forever! But, another part of you wanted to keep your distance. Maybe there were other, better choices. Or you could come back for her. After all, this was your first time in this world; maybe you shouldn't be so reckless, especially since Pallet Town looked like a small-knit community.

What will you do?
1122111.title: Around Pallet Town

11221111.content:
You decide to go after Delia. After all, if you get to have whatever genie you want, why not make one your childhood crush?

Still, you had to be careful: obviously, you couldn't do it in broad daylight. Everyone would notice and you'd either have to leave or risk losing Delia. Plus, it might make future searches in this world harder.

But, you needed to make sure Delia didn't see you. Keeping to the sidelines, pretending to look at things in the market, you keep a close eye on Delia. As soon as she starts to walk home, you follow her--first going by path then entering the surrounding forest when you two are too far away for it to be coincidence. Quietly, you follow Delia, hoping that no one will be around with her once she returns home. As she enters her house, you think about the best way to go about this: on one hand, it might be best to just surprise her, in order to make sure she doesn't get anyone and you aren't seen.

Then again, surprise might not be the best course of action either; maybe instead you should rely on stealth, try to make it that Delia will never see you coming in the first place. Of course, that could lead to some confusion if someone is with her.

You could also try to meet her, maybe even give her a "choice" to join, but that runs the risk of her trying to contact someone.
11221111.title: Delicious Delia

112211113.content:
You walk up and knock on the door, waiting for the auburn-haired beauty to show up. After a few minutes, the doorknob turns and the door creaks open to reveal Delia, her eyes first showing a slight uncertainty as if she wasn't expecting anyone, that quickly turned into a motherly warmth upon seeing you.

"Oh hello," Delia said, smiling. "And who might you be, young man?"

You give your name, quickly saying, "I'm a friend of Ash's. He asked me to meet him here."

"Oh, it's wonderful to meet you!" Delia responded happily. "I'm his mother, Delia Ketchum." Peaking her head out, she looked around a bit. "Strange... even when Ash does his surprise visits, he usually doesn't arrive late." Shrugging her shoulders, she continued, "He probably just got caught up with something. In any case, please--come in!" She opens the door a bit to let you in. "Any friend of my son's is a friend of mine!"

You thank her and come in quickly, loving how easy it was to get into here. That's probably one other reason why you loved Delia--for a grown woman, she was so naïve at times! It still was wickedly delicious to know that, by letting you in, Delia had sealed her fate as a magical slave--perhaps until you had your fun, perhaps for all eternity! It didn't matter; you held all of the cards, and not only was Delia unaware she was already beaten, she wasn't even aware she was playing!

Which gave you an idea; why not take this farther and reveal the truth to Delia? Tell her that you were here to make her a djinn? Just imagine her reaction! How adorable she would look if she utterly confused, unaware that all of what you were telling her was true! Or even her breaking down, now realizing her inescapable fate. You'd keep it quick, of course; you don't want her to suffer, just get a bit freaked out and stressed. For your entertainment, of course.

Then again... there was the problem that, if you waited too long, Delia might end up fighting against you. Even though she was an adorkable young woman and a bit of a ditz, she certainly wasn't helpless. Putting aside any Pokemon she might have gotten, there was also the fact that she could defend herself. Sure, you were certain the lamp could get you out of any legal trouble just by djnnifying someone else, but you wanted to avoid unnecessary confrontation if possible. Perhaps it would be better to just djinnify her now, then let your more wicked fantasies come up for someone else...
112211113.title: Faux Friendly Face

choices: "Actually, what I have for you is not just the lamp,"
1122111132.content:
Like all events, the first time is always special. So why not make this a special event between you and Delia?

"Can I get you anything, sweetie?" Delia said in a warm fashion, smiling. "You must be so tired from traveling for so long,"

"Actually, I'm just fine," You replied with a smirk. "In fact, I've got something for you instead!"

Pulling out the lamp, Delia responds, "Oh my, what a beautiful little relic. Is that for me?"
1122111132.title: Fun For The Whole Family

choices: ...She spoke out, "Okay," and rubbed the lamp.
...She laughed, saying, "What a delightful prank there!"
11221111323.content:
"Oh?" Delia cocked an eyebrow, a bit curious.

"Yes. You see, Delia, I'm about to make you an offer that is so amazing, so awe-inspiring, that simply put you must take it!"

"Uhh... okay," She responded, clearly still confused.

"You see, what I have here is a Genie's Lamp!" You continue. "With but a few commands from me, or your own voluntary assistance, you shall gain the power, beauty, and liberty of a goddess, as well as the necessary restraint so that your power does not go to your head,"

"Okay..."

"Of course, you'll also need someone to watch over you. Luckily, the lamp has chosen me to be your overseer, your guardian, to ensure that you are safe, protected, and cared for."

"Okay..." Dumbfounded, Delia merely stood there with her hands to her sides. Of course, the look she gave you seemed like a combination between, "Is this a prank?" and "Are you mental?"

"But I'm not done yet! Obviously, even in this glorious lamp, you'd still get lonely, so you'll most likely will be receiving new companions in the form of various other djinn I manage to grap!"

"Okay..."

"Of course, you'll be special; as the first of my harem, you shall be the Djinn Princess and rule over all the rest. You shall be their leader and in the end, you can have your way with them however you want--as long as I allow it!"

"Okay..."

"So, what do you say, Delia? Will you take me up on my offer?" As you finished your speech, you held out the lamp, eager to see what Delia's reaction would be.

At first, she just stared at it in confusion, unsure of what to do. But, after a moment...
11221111323.title: An Offer You Can't Refuse

11223.content:
You always fantasized about changing Jessica Rabbit into a genie; you have no doubt she'd look great in a harem outfit. But then you remembered that she was married to Roger Rabbit. That could get complicated.

Then you got an idea. Instead of Toontown, you went to Cool World. Sure enough, you saw her in a nightclub, doing one of her sexy dances.

What do you do?
11223.title: Holli Would If She Could

122111.title: Go back in time to find out how she became a genie

1221111.content:
The Kingdom Of Arabian sultan's palace

How is your entertainment, Your highness? Asked The Sultan's most trusted adviser.

The sultan in General was a man with who stood the height of 5 and 3 feet. He Had Brown skin and eyes. He also had a curly long Mustache, And goatee. His Attire Consisted of a gray sultan's Pants, With 3 golden belts, and vest that matched his pants, A white shirt underneath, and a golden Sultan's hat with a red gem and feather on top.

As the sultan watched the entertainment, A bored expression appeared on his face much to the dismay of the adviser.

I grow Bored of watching this entertainment! Bring In the harem dancing girls! Said The sultan.

It shall be done, My Highness. Answered the Adviser just before he rung one of the bells to signal the current act to end and the next to begin.

As the previous act left the room, A group of ten harem girls came out and began their routine for their king. All of them had their Beauty in one way or another. However, There was one who stood at the height of 5 and the foot of 9, Had blue eyes and long raven like hair that covered one her eyes. She wore a pink and gold top that house the ample bosom, and a matching pair of pants that perfectly accommodated her lower curves.

Wow! I have never seen such a beauty before in my life. Even My wife pales and comparison to her beauty, But then again i could say about half of the girls that lived in the palace. Thought the sultan as he watched the girls or more specifically the one that caught his attention.

This did not go unnoticed by said girls who just smiled and continued to dance along her fellow harem sisters. When the routine was finally finished, The sultan clapped loudly causing the adviser to smile with Relief.

You, In the pink and gold outfit stay behind. Adviser, Please send the rest to their rooms while i talk to this woman in private. Replied the sultan.

Upon hearing the sultan call her out, The girl did as commanded and stayed there until it was only her and the sultan in the throne room.

My adviser never told me the names of any of my harem girls, But, one who possess beauty that could rival the sun goddess herself, i feel it be very insulting not to know your name. Replied The sultan earning a smile from the harem girl.

My name is Desiree, My Sultan. And i am flattered you would compare me by beauty to such a beautiful deity. Is there anything that you wish from me, My sultan? Desiree Replied and Asked.

Just know this. If there is anything you want or if anyone who disrespect you, Please don't Hesitate to tell me. I will do everything in my power to deal with that matter. Now you can head back to your room, My Dear. The Sultan explained before Desiree walked away and leaving her master with a longing smile.

In the Harem girl room of the palace

He actually said you had beauty that rivaled the sun goddess and asked your name? Wow, That is new. Said one of the older Harem girls.

Not only that, But he also told me to let him know if there is anything i wanted or anyone disrespecting me to let him know and he would take good care of it all. Desiree Explained Causing more shock around her sisters and for good reason.

Even some of the older girls who were older never knew the sultan never made offers like this to anyone. Especially seeing as he had no need to because if he wanted any of them with or without permission.

I am so jealous of you, Desiree I mean if it were me in your shoes i would woo and seduce him to the point where he would dump his wife and marry me. That way, I could be ravished with the riches a girl like me desires and deserves.

That Might not be a bad idea. I did always want my own kingdom, and he dd say that to ask if i wanted it. But, I can't just ask for it right away I am still new here. So I will wait it out while enticing him more and more as i go. Then when enough time has passed, For what i want by any means necessary. Desiree Thought to herself with a smile in her face just before she went to bed along with her sisters.
1221111.title: Desiree is banished and finds a temple with a d...

choices: Desiree's first step to Djinnification begins
12211111.content:
A Woman in her mid 30's sat in her own throne with half a dozen guards on Each of her sides for protection. The woman in general was currently enjoying a bowl of seedless grapes when her husband have arrived in her room.

Good evening , Dear. How are you doing? The Woman asked.

I haven't felt better in my entire life, honey. Not only did i enjoy good entertainment, But the moral and economical gain of the country is an all time high. The Sultan Replied.

I am going to take a walk to clear my head. You four will be coming with me. The wife of the sultan explained as the four guards walked with her.

Your majesty, I know that took of longing on our leader's face. He only gets it if woman he really desires catches his eye. One of her most observant loyal guards explained.

I know, But The problem here is i don't know which one has caught his eyes. I need to make sure when i either banish or execute her I got the right. So Captain I will be giving you the task of being my eyes and ears when i am not around. I want you to find out who my competition is and when you inform me from there, I will take care of the rest. The sultan's wife ordered.

It shall be done your majesty. Captain said before walking out the room.

As for the rest of you, We will going on that walk through town and i will intend to reward you all for your loyalty to me.

Thank you, We are not worthy of your rewards. The remaining three guards said as one.

I have no clue who are you, But while am forced to tolerate harem girls due the stupid laws of this kingdom, There is no way i am allowing any threats to my marriage.

3 months have passed since Desiree's First day at the palace and she figured the sultan's feelings attachment for her grew to a point that he had never shown with any of the other girls. After a second week of her being in the palace, the sultan gave her several Privileges that not even the oldest harem girls received. One of them was she was free to travel the place whenever she wanted.

The sultan was also true to his word about dealing disrespect personally as well. The day before her third month in the palace, Desiree Had the misfortune of someone who was guard that groped her ample backside.

The results of this was Desiree quickly kneeing the guy that touched her. This of course alerted the other guards and the sultan himself.

What happened here? Asked the sultan.

I was trying to to take her back to the other harem girls seeing as she is not allowed to be out past her curfew. The guard replied in his defense. When i touched her... She Kneed me in the groin.

You did no such thing! You laid a hand on me without my permission and i punished you accordingly! Replied Desiree.

There we have it sultan. This woman confessed to not...

Silence! The sultan roared causing everyone and Desiree to shiver in fear.

I gave her all the time she needed.

30 lashes for the first time offense, Second the lost of a part of your body of our choosing and the 3rd... You are to be executed. The guard replied only for malevolent smile n the sultan's face.

I am glad you know the penalties and normally you would get the lightest punishment seeing as if it is your first offense. Guards treat the offender as if he were a 3rd time offender. the sultan replied causing horror to feel the guard's eyes

The guards took the injured man to meet his fate.

I am sorry you had to see that side of me, Desiree, But i mentioned before will not tolerate any disrespect!

The sultan also said: I have a surprise in store for you tomorrow.

Guard, Take Desiree to my throne room Tomorrow. Guard her with your life.

It shall be done, Your Highness.

The sultan's wife stood in one of the balconies of her husband's throne room. She found the harem girl that had captured his husband's eyes.

Here she is, your highness. Said the guard.

You had a surprise for me. I have to ask what exactly is it? Desiree Asked calmly.

I wanted to let you know that you have captured my heart and because of that, I want to make your heart's desire come true. The sultan said shocking both Desiree and The wife.

Well ever since i was a little girl, i have always wanted my own kingdom.

Is that all? Well My army has just finished fighting and taking over another kingdom and i have no problem giving it you and no catch.

I can't believe it! This is too good to be sure. I m going to become a queen of my own kingdom and find my true love!

I will get the paperwork done, Desiree, So by Tomorrow will be sending you off to your own new kingdom. I am hoping we can do wonderful things together. The sultan Explained.

When The sultan's wife heard that and left the area. She knew what she had in mind. That Desiree had to go.

When Desiree was awoken by one of the sultan's guard she was more tired than usual. This was due to the soon to be coming good things. Desiree put on the royal clothing that the sultan's guard had give her.

The sultan gave her the work in paper she would need and off she went on the finest steed with an escort.

And so went Desiree and The guards in the escort, Talking about some stories and drinking a canteen of water.

As she crossed the desert with her guards, Desiree thought herself about be made a buttermilk. She always wanted to try one.

As Desiree pulled up to the outer gate of the new kingdom. Two Guards blocked her way with swords.

I was sent as the new ruler of this kingdom. Here is the paperwork. Desiree revealed It to the guards.

The guards suddenly grabbed her in the arms and pulled her into the city before they thrown her into a sack.

Desiree opened her eyes to see herself in a courtroom with the wife and guards.

When the sultan learns about this he will have all your heads! I was promised this kingdom by him!

You won't be getting it, Desiree! The wife replied with a smile on her face.

The court have decided that Desiree was sentenced to exile not only from the city, But the entire empire.

Well banished or not, I am still going to give her a camel with Stuff she will need and you can't stop me! The sultan said.

Desiree is seen being given and sat on the camel before the guards came with about 20 canteens of water and food.

And off She went in part of her banishment from the empire.

info.brief_description: Turn your favorite characters into your own genie harem.
info.description:
Travel across various worlds as you turn your favorite characters into your own personal genie/djinn harem.

After your latest relationship goes sour, you find a magic lamp. Instead of containing a djinn, though, it gives you the chance to make your own, as well as the ability to travel to other worlds in order to gain more genies. Will you be a kind or cruel master? Will you take willing participants, or is choice not an option for your harem? Who will you chose? Step in and find out!

Portrayal of Djinn:
While the characteristics of the djinn can be like anything you want, there are a few things that need to be followed:
         * The djinn grant unlimited wishes.
         * There is no limit to how many djinn you can have.
         * When transformed, characters will gain a default "stereotypical-harem" outfit, as well as a pair of gold cuffs that go on their wrists. These will not change except with a wish. Things like hairstyles, jewelry, make-up, or the like can change randomly and is up for you to decide. Some physical appearances (like hair length) can also change, but gender does not unless a wish is granted to either change a particular djinn's gender or make the lamp transform all djinn into a certain gender.
         * Djinn can also freely turn their legs into a tail and back again. The color of their (current) harem pants will match the tail's color.
         * Djinn can fuse with one or more other djinn to create new djinn who are even more powerful. They can also unfuse as well.
         * While djinn will retain their personalities upon transformation          , most of the time they will be loyal and submissive to their master, regardless of how they were before their transformation. Some have been known to rebel (even they started out loyal or were loyal pre-djnnification). Any betrayals should be used purely for story.
         * Djinn cannot turn back to normal by themselves; once they are djinn, they remain so for all eternity. The only way for this to reverse is to either wish the djinn free or wish that the lamp had more of a "temporary" hold on its hosts.
         * The "default" djinnification technique is "(Character's Name), Djnnifiy!"
         * When a djinn is "destroyed" (is killed) their body dissolves into a white-blue powder.

Rules:
         * While ending the story is okay (even encouraged), you must have at least one djinn before ending.
         * Unless changed later on, keep all djinn the same gender that they were when transformed.
         * No real life people or celebrities! However, it is okay to transform a character that an actor you like portrayed. Original characters are allowed as well, but you are responsible for their portrayal and making them interesting.
         * Sexual encounters and fetishes are fine, up to and including graphic sex scenes. However, make sure to keep it no more mature than an R-Rating.
                   *While not required, a warning at the start of the chapter in regards to sexual events, scenes, or fetishes (like vore, scat, hypnosis, etc.) is encouraged and polite.
         * Failure to comply to these rules will result in the deletion of chapters.

Other than that, have fun and enjoy yourselves!
